item.title: Boot Linux in text console
item.description: Get rid of graphic boot on Linux with a few modifications in grub configuration : # edit your grub config sudo vi /etc/default/grub # remove splash, quiet, ... from GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT="text" # save the file and update grub sudo update-grub
